content:
What is the recommended way to see that Documenter.jl docs deploy correctly for the first time before pushing to master?

Temporarily set devbranch?
There is a preview feature that you can use, see docs for push_preview here: https://juliadocs.github.io/Documenter.jl/stable/lib/public/#Documenter.deploydocs
Awesome! No idea how I missed it when reading the docs :flushed:
